title: "Paramore Decline Tennessee Grammys Honour \"Until Allison Russell Is Given the Same Recognition\""
excerpt: "Williams thanked Russell for using her \"voice and artistry to band people together, not tear them apart,\" in a statement provided to The Tennessean you can find below. Via an Instagram story, Paramore affirmed that they \"will not accept any acknowledgement or honor from the TN House until Allison Russell is given the same recognition.\""
